Ingredients.1: 0.5 cups self-rising flour, plus more for kneading

Ingredients.5: 0.5 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, plus more for garnish

Directions.1: Mix flour and Greek yogurt together in a medium bowl until a shaggy dough forms. Transfer to a surface dusted with more self-rising flour, and knead for 8 to 10 minutes. Continue adding flour as needed if the dough is too sticky.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.3: Combine melted butter, garlic, parsley, and salt in a small bowl.

Directions.4: Cut the dough into 8 pieces, roughly 2 ounces each. Roll each segment into an even 12-inch log. Shape the logs into knots by forming a cross, wrapping the top piece around the bottom piece, then connecting the two ends. Press together tightly to seal.

Directions.5: Move the knots to the prepared baking sheet and brush with garlic butter.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes. Brush with remaining garlic butter, garnish with more parsley, and serve warm.
